This is a very flattering dress around the mid section. Unfortunately pre menopause has caused me to gain quite a bit of weight pretty quickly, especially around my waist, but this dress hides it quite nicely. I was really excited about getting this dress. It looks so cute and polkadots are my most favorite so I read the reviews. It said to go size up. I’m a medium. I’m 5 foot eight and about 140 pounds so I ordered a large and I was so excited because I got here today And I tried it on and I could barely get it over my shoulders or my chest. I’m a little bit chesty, but medium shoe usually fit and this one I could barely get on. Also, they said it was a wraparound and basically yes, it was, but in my day , wraparounds where you could pull it as tight and loosen it up as you want and this one is sewed all the way up now that may be the style today this I don’t know about the size really irritated me so I’m going to be sending it back tomorrow and going to the Caribbean so I won’t have time to order another one. How sad it’s a really cute dress just you may have to size up more than one size.

Disliked how the dress fit. It ties right under the bust. So if you are busty, no matter the size, it really emphasizes it!  I bought mine for a funeral....nope. Also, very, very wrinkled. Ordered 2 different sizes, one came without the belt. Returned both.
Love this dress, it’s light and airy. Got tons of compliments wearing it! Great purchase
I really liked this dress, but noticed that the pictured belt was missing so I returned it. Asked for a replacement only to receive it still missing the belt. Please fix this.
I bought this for my daughters college graduation. I was glad to find something in this color for graduation day. The dress fit well, and was very comfortable. Good value for the price.

This dress is my absolute favorite. I have purchased it in a pattern and now this solid blue. It is the perfect dress to wear in the summer with its light, airy fabric that flows beautifully when you walk. The 100% rayon is machine washable, but hang it to dry because rayon is not a material that can handle being dried.  I do find it to be a little low cut, so I tacked the front of the dress so it is a little more modest. The other odd thing is that it really isn’t finished on the edges with a hem, but rather is serged on all the edges. Surprisingly, it holds up well and doesn’t ravel, but just something to keep in mind if you prefer a more finished look.

Loved the fabric and style.  Honestly I am 64 years old, have gained quite a bite of weight after a couple of surgeries and a cancer survivor; so feeling good about yourself can be a struggle.  The style of the dress suited me well despite my weight.  I felt beautiful and would recommend this dress for older women. Thank you.
I absolutely love this dress. It is Flattering and very cute for a date night or even family pictures highly recommend
Light weight and comfortable
This dress slays.. flattering and put together well.  Worth every  cent!

I bought this dress to wear to a football game. The fit was flattering and the color was perfect. The material is rayon, which is thin, cheaper material, and tends to wrinkle easily. Knowing this before I purchased it, I felt I knew what I was getting & didn’t have overly high expectations. What surprised me most was how flattering the dress is on. I’m 5’0 ft, weigh 126ish and ordered the small even though Amazon suggested a medium, I felt the medium would be too much material for my height. The small fit perfectly. I ironed this with a spray starch to give the material a little more structure & combat wrinkles & this worked fine. I wore this all day and it held up great. Upon ironing this dress I did notice a shoulder seam that wasn’t fully sewn which was frustrating to have to mend at the last minute. That being said, I’m still happy overall with this purchase. I knew for the price and material that it would be a dress I would wear a few times & donate, that’s just been my history with anything rayon because it doesn’t hold up overtime. I felt the price of the dress was appropriate & the description was spot on. It worked great for what I needed & I’m happy with my purchase.
Poor quality fabric, not worth the money, sent it right back
I wore this dress to a wedding and received many compliments. I was comfortable and able to dance all night.

This dress was super comfortable and flattering. I love how flowy the bottom is! I wore it to a wedding. It does wrinkle very easily but I just sprayed a little water on it and the wrinkles came out. The material is light but feels well made. I am usually a medium and that’s what I ordered, but I feel like a small might have fit a bit better. If I had more time I would have tried a small but the medium ended up being fine, especially when I tied the belt/tie/bow thing on
This dress was great to travel with. Went from day time casual to night time chic very easily with change of shoes/accessories. Loved the material.
I love how this dress fits and feels! I would’ve given 5 stars, but the belt was missing when I opened the packaging.
